name: MM LinkedIn Connection
author: Rodrigo Techera

sections.description:
This Plugin Allow you to have LinkedIn Social Login in your site.

Special Settings

A section is added to your Settings menu, allowing you to configure your credentials and the styles for the button.
sections.installation:
1. Download MM LinkedIn Connect.
  2. Upload the ‘mm-linkedin-connect’ directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…)
  3. Activate MM LinkedIn Connect from your Plugins page.
  4. Create a Linkedin Application here https://www.linkedin.com/developer/apps/new.
  5. Authorization callback URL needs to be your domain.
  6. Take the Client ID and Client Secret from your recent created App, and complete the fields in your settings.

short_description: This Plugin Allow you to have LinkedIn Social Login in your site.
